title: Fail strict replay verification when lowering-consumed metadata parity fields drift
feature: M06 Lane C metadata/lowering parity fail-closed guard

diagnostics.message: compiled module metadata does not match emitted textual interface

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: executor-affinity and actor-isolation metadata consumed by lowering remain explicit and one-to-one
strict replay verification fails closed when required lowering metadata fields are missing
metadata parity checks execute before importer lowering consumes declarations

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized emission preserves lowering-consumed metadata parity fields
optimization does not suppress strict mismatch diagnostics for metadata drift
fail-closed replay behavior remains equivalent to -O0

abi_field_stability.stability_property: executor-affinity metadata remains parity-stable for lowering decisions
actor-isolation metadata remains parity-stable for boundary lowering
